description: Removes the association between an approval rule template and one or more specified repositories.

parameters.name: approvalRuleTemplateName
parameters.description: The name of the template that you want to disassociate from one or more repositories.

parameters.name: repositoryNames
parameters.description: The repository names that you want to disassociate from the approval rule template. (string) ---

nested_items.name: disassociatedRepositoryNames
nested_items.description: A list of repository names that have had their association with the template removed.

nested_items.name: errors
nested_items.description: A list of any errors that might have occurred while attempting to remove the association between the template and the repositories.

nested_items.name: repositoryName
nested_items.description: The name of the repository where the association with the template was not able to be removed.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: An error code that specifies whether the repository name was not valid or not found.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: An error message that provides details about why the repository name was either not found or not valid.
